name: Around a Campfire
description:
A simple game about overcoming the doubts of your toughest years.

Join Gustaf, Rèmy and Beatrix on their summer camping trip.

Mountains are high, rivers are tricky and woods dark and scary.

Help them leap into action, face their fears and go beyond their self-imposed bounds.

A game made for the Game Off 2019 jam by GitHub

RAFTING

Avoid the obstacles and raft through the river.

  • A to go right
  • D to go left
  • W to speed up
  • S to slow down

HIKING

Don't let ghosts catch you or panic overwhelm you.
Stand still to lower panic bar.

  • WASD to move in all directions

CLIMBING

Reach the top of the mountain without falling

  • A / D to go left / right
  • W to jump high
  • W + A / D to jump left or right

"Beauty Flow", "Come Play with Me", "Iron Horse", "Sovereign Quarter" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
